basic_bot.rb

Path: basic_bot.rb
Last Update: Tue May 15 11:59:42 -0400 2007

This Bot

This simple bot just updates your status based on a random entry in rules.txt. You will need to open this file and change the email and password it is using.

Running Your Bot

Like so: 

     ruby basic_bot.rb

But remember to open it up and change the email and password!

Required files

facebook_bot/facebook_bot  

[Validate]
